column1: 23095,She-Hulk (2005) #37,37,18238,103,"Our Gamma-irradiated emerald beauty is facing a United Nations inquiry, and they're throwing the book at her... Mallory Book that is. Will she pay for the crime of heroism? Will she be forever called a Menace to Society?  And hey... didn't she used to have a friend who was one of those ""Secret Invader"" types?  To everyone's surprise, old friends-and old enemies-arrive with new developments to complicate She-Hulk's life.,2009,1
